name: semillero-dashboard
description: Dashboard para seguimiento de progreso de estudiantes en Google Classroom - Semillero Digital

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install-all

author: Semillero Digital
